name: Abstract Platformer (IRBISStudio)
description:
Hi, this is my first game. It has not yet been completed and has a small number of bugs, the first version.
Features:
Well this is an ordinary complex platformer with a small plot
So far, 12 levels with a boss battle (There will be more with updates)
Vector graphics
Simple operation
That's all
P.s yes it's google translator
